item.title: Eagles Island 50 minute Narrated Boat Cruise
item.description: For those who want to bypass the crowds in Wilmington, but still want to get an overview of the area, this Eagle Island Narrated Boat Cruise is a great choice. Depending on what time you book, you’ll either cruise along the historic downtown and Eagle Island, or you’ll go under the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge. Both options provide live commentary for you to enjoy as you cruise.

image.alt: Eagles Island 50 minute Narrated Boat Cruise

item.title: Sailing Charters in Wilmington
item.description: Take in the Wilmington riverwalk from the water and experience the thrill of sailing with this exclusive private sailboat charter. Set off along the downtown riverfront to admire the city from a unique perspective, including the state ports and other waterfront landmarks. Relax with your group of up to six passengers, with the option of bringing your own drinks on board. Choose a morning, afternoon, or sunset tour to suit your schedule.

image.alt: Sailing Charters in Wilmington

item.title: History and Architecture Walking Tour
item.description: Wilmington, North Carolina, was founded in the 1720s, which means that the city has over 300 years of colonial history and architecture scattered throughout its streets. Join a local for a guided tour of the city, learning about its history from settlement through today. You’ll also uncover the stories behind its architectural styles which range from Spanish Baroque to Neoclassical.

image.alt: History and Architecture Walking Tour

item.title: Sunset Harbor Cruise Tour
item.description: Sit back, relax, and set sail for stunning views of the sunset. With a friendly crew and a custom-built boat, you’ll be able to take in the sea and all its glory for 1.5 hours during this scenic harbor cruise. On top of the gorgeous views, you can try your luck at spotting wildlife like dolphins and turtles. The crew will be on hand to make sure you’re having fun too.

image.alt: Sunset Harbor Cruise Tour

item.title: Sunset Sail Tour
item.description: Cruise through the waters of Wrightsville Beach aboard a 42-foot (13-meter) yacht during this small-group coastal sailing adventure. Enjoy scenic views of the surrounding waterways and barrier islands, and catch a glimpse of marine life. Soft drinks, juice, bottled water, and light refreshments are provided on board the boat. Plus, choose from morning, afternoon, or sunset cruises to best suit your schedule.

image.alt: Sunset Sail Tour

item.title: Wilmington Ghosts: Phantoms of Pirates and Patriots Tour
item.description:
Unveil the spine-chilling secrets of Wilmington on our top-rated ghost tour, where history's dark past comes to life!
Stroll through streets rich with Southern charm and eerie tales of bloodshed and bizarre happenings. From deadly insurrections to supernatural legends, Wilmington Ghosts will lead you on a mile-long journey through haunted landmarks like the enigmatic Thalian Hall and the iconic Cotton Exchange.
Join us for an unforgettable evening as we explore the most haunted spots in Wilmington, including the mysterious Water Street Retreats and the enchanting Wilmington Riverwalk. This in-person guided walking tour promises thrills and chills, immersing you in the ghostly tales that linger in the air.
Please note that while we delve into the supernatural, we respect the privacy of residents and businesses, ensuring our journey remains on public paths.
Experience the spine-tingling allure of Wilmington and discover why it’s a must-visit for ghost enthusiasts!

image.alt: Wilmington Ghosts: Phantoms of Pirates and Patriots Tour

item.title: 2-Hr, 30-Min Tour de Wilmington E-Bike Tour/Sightseeing/History
item.description: Discover Wilmington with ease on a private guided e-bike tour. With an electric bike, you can go further with less effort. Follow your guide around through the heart of downtown Wilmington and discover its top attractions before cruising along the scenic Riverwalk along the Cape Fear River to Greenfield Lake and back.

image.alt: 2-Hr, 30-Min Tour de Wilmington E-Bike Tour/Sightseeing/History

item.title: Island Hopper Cruise in Wrightsville Beach
item.description: The Carolina Runner is a custom-built 40-foot craft that includes a bar, blue tooth sound system, LED party lights, a loading ramp for easy shore access to Masonboro Island, complete modern toilet facilities, and many other amenities for groups up to 40.

image.alt: Island Hopper Cruise in Wrightsville Beach

item.title: Afternoon Sail
item.description: Make getting out onto Wilmington’s waters a sit-back-and-relax kind of adventure. With this yacht experience, you and your intimate crew will hop aboard the 42’ sailing vessel, following your captain along the waterways and barrier islands off Wrightsville Beach. While catching wildlife sightings is likely, phenomenal views and salty sea breezes come guaranteed. And if you BYOB, your favorite drinks will be on the menu.

image.alt: Afternoon Sail

item.title: Private Charter
item.description: Book this private charter to explore secluded anchorages, do some offshore sailing, or even transfer from Wilminton or Southport. It’s up to you to decide where you’d like to sail. This is perfect for your group of up to six guests for comfort. Your captain will tell you stories of the area while you either help sail or relax aboard your vessel.

image.alt: Private Charter

item.title: Private Custom Brewery Tour in a '72 VW Bus - Roadies Local
item.description:
Your brew bus tours is fully customizable and private for up to 7 people. The itinerary here is just a suggestion. We will pick you at your place in Wilmington, Wrightsville Beach, Carolina Beach, or Kure Beach.
Wilmington is home to 20 craft breweries, and counting! What better way to visit them than cruising around in a classic VW Bus?
Step 1: After booking, we will contact you to confirm pick up location & start time. Example - your home, hotel, airbnb, or agreed upon location in Wilmington.
Step 2 - Pick your stops. Need help? Let us recommend the stops and itinerary based on what you like or where you are staying.
Step 3 - We pick you up and take you on your tour! We safely drop you back off at your final destination.
Travel back in time in our vintage VW with custom interior and seating for 7.
Hop on, and drink local.

image.alt: Private Custom Brewery Tour in a '72 VW Bus - Roadies Local

item.title: 1 Hour Private Tarot Reading in Wilmington
item.description: A beautiful setting in historic downtown Wilmington. Brittany Johnson is an expert in tarot reading, she has decades of experience, and has done 1000's of readings world-wide. This is an interactive, educational, inspiring, and most of all fun. The tarot will help give clarity in purpose, guidance, and direction. This experience will help you become more intuitive and to pay attention to signs in your life A wonderful way to unwind and reset your life vision. Extremely inspirational Perfect for small groups, ladies night out, bachelorette parties. You do not have to be a witch, to find your inner magic.

image.alt: 1 Hour Private Tarot Reading in Wilmington

item.title: 5-Hour Wilmington Guided River to Sea E-Bike Adventure Tour
item.description:
Embark on the ultimate outdoor adventure with the River to Sea Tour, designed for those who crave the thrill of exploring the great outdoors on a high-performance e-bike. This unforgettable journey takes you from downtown Wilmington to the pristine shores of Wrightsville Beach, blending scenic beauty with exhilarating exploration.
Before hitting the trail, every tour starts with a comprehensive orientation to ensure riders are confident and comfortable operating their e-bikes. The recommended route includes a luxurious stop at Wrightsville Beach’s prestigious Blockade Runner Beach Resort. Here, riders can choose to dine and enjoy exclusive access to the resort’s lush Lawn & Garden areas, complete with beach chairs, loungers, and direct beach access. For those seeking more adventure, activity rentals such as kayaks, surfboards, and stand-up paddleboards are available.
This tour is crafted for experienced riders and classified as a challenging excursion.

image.alt: 5-Hour Wilmington Guided River to Sea E-Bike Adventure Tour

item.title: Wacky Wilmington Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

image.alt: Wacky Wilmington Scavenger Hunt

item.title: Wilmington Coup and Massacre Historic Tour
item.description: In 1898, North Carolina's government was overthrown by a white supremacist coup - the only successful coup d'état in American history. Wilmington saw the worst violence, with a horrific massacre terrorizing the city. This historian-guided tour seeks to educate and inform locals and visitors about this tragic and important part of American history.

image.alt: Wilmington Coup and Massacre Historic Tour

item.title: Private Tiki Boat Tour on Cape Fear River
item.description: Tiki Pub Wilmington offers a unique and unforgettable boat tour experience, blending the charm of Wilmington's historic waterfront with a festive, tropical ambiance. This floating tiki bar cruise allows guests to relax and enjoy breathtaking views of the Cape Fear River and iconic landmarks such as the Battleship North Carolina, all while sipping on drinks and listening to our bluetooth stereo system. What makes the Tiki Pub tour special is its lively atmosphere, complete with island-inspired music, comfortable seating, and an onboard BYOB bar. The combination of scenic beauty, historical insights, and a fun, laid-back environment makes this tour a must-do for both locals and visitors seeking a memorable adventure on the water.

image.alt: Private Tiki Boat Tour on Cape Fear River

item.title: Electric Bike Rentals in Topsail Island and Surf City
item.description: Explore Topsail Island with ease on an electric bike. With pedal assist and throttle assist, you can choose how much assistance you want, and go further with less effort. Avoid the hassle of traffic or parking, create your own itinerary, and explore at your own pace. Pre-book your half-day e-bike rental and enjoy free local delivery and pickup for extra convenience.

image.alt: Electric Bike Rentals in Topsail Island and Surf City

item.title: Scavenger Hunt Adventure in Wilmington by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: When you’re in Wilmington, try to survive a zombie apocalypse in this self-guided scavenger hunt. You’ll have to work with your team to find specific items, and also perform zombie-themed challenges to collect points. You’ll be chatting to your host the entire time, so you’ll have a bit of assistance, but mostly it’s up to you.

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt Adventure in Wilmington by Zombie Scavengers

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Wilmington by Operation City Quest
item.description: Explore Wilmington while doing a self-guided scavenger hunt, where you’ll have to solve riddles and look for a list of items around the city in the most fun way. You’ll have a remote host that you can chat with the entire time you’re on the hunt. Another element is competing with other players by checking the app’s leaderboard.

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Wilmington by Operation City Quest

item.title: Numerology and Angelic Quest in Wilmington
item.description: A unique way to look at yourself and your Numerology. It is very entertaining and will give great insight into your career path, and love life. You can see how your Numerology as been shaping your life behind the scenes and is all around you. Numerology holds great potential and learning your numerology is a way to unlock even more potential in your life.

image.alt: Numerology and Angelic Quest in Wilmington

item.title: Scavenger Hunt in Wilmington by Wacky Walks
item.description: Collect points along the way as you perform tasks while you make your way through this scavenger hunt in Wilmington. You can start when you like, since this is an app-led hunt. You’ll still have a remote host to help you out whenever needed, though. Learn all about Wilmington while having fun at the same time with this approximately two-hour scavenger hunt.

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt in Wilmington by Wacky Walks

item.title: Celebrate with a Holiday Scavenger Hunt in Wilmington with Holly Jolly Hunt
item.description: Celebrate the magic of the season this year with Holly Jolly Hunt. Holly Jolly Hunt is an app based scavenger hunt that you can play anywhere of your choosing. Explore the city and look for holiday related items, both traditional and not so traditional. Take a photo through the app to score points for your scavenger hunt team. Perform fun, holiday challenges that will bring laughter to your team. See your score on the leaderboard compared to other teams from all over. Holly Jolly Hunt is guaranteed to provide lasting holiday memories. Whether you play with friends, family, or even co-workers, Holly Jolly will put a smile on your face for the rest of the year!

image.alt: Celebrate with a Holiday Scavenger Hunt in Wilmington with Holly Jolly Hunt

item.title: Wilmington City Scavenger Hunt by Crazy Dash
item.description: In this fun Crazy Dash scavenger hunt of Wilmington , players will use an app to find objects in the city, in any order they want, to collect points. They'll also complete challenges for points. Players can see their score on the app's live rankings. All scavenger hunts have a remote host to help along the way. Crazy Dash is our easiest and most casual scavenger hunt. Come explore with us in Wilmington.

image.alt: Wilmington City Scavenger Hunt by Crazy Dash

item.title: 1 Hour Walking Film Tour in Wilmington Downtown
item.description:
Leading the Cinematic Journey: Wilmington Unveiled
As your tour guide, I’ll lead you through the enchanting streets of Wilmington—a place known as “Hollywood East.” For decades, this coastal gem has been the backdrop for blockbuster movies, beloved TV shows, and indie productions. With over 400 credits to its name, Wilmington isn’t just a film location; it’s a living, breathing set where creativity thrives.
Explore with Me: A Hollywood East Adventure
Picture yourself walking in the footsteps of iconic characters while visiting real locations that once graced the silver screen. From historic buildings to scenic waterfronts, every corner holds a piece of Hollywood magic.
Book Your Spot: Wilmywood awaits
Whether you’re a film buff, an adventure seeker, or simply curious, this experience promises memories that will last a lifetime. Ready to step into the spotlight? Book your tour, and together, we’ll uncover Wilmington’s cinematic charm.

image.alt: 1 Hour Walking Film Tour in Wilmington Downtown
